description: This shell script monitors system logs for Utopia triggers and manages a trigger monitoring service, including starting, stopping, and restarting the trigger handler process.

methods.name: service_start
methods.description: Starts the trigger monitoring service, logs the start event, and sets the service status to started.

methods.name: service_stop
methods.description: Stops the trigger monitoring service by killing the trigger handler process and updates the service status to stopped.
